videos.title: This card mite be a problem
videos.description:
Kickstarter - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/algenpfleger/johannes-voss-2025-magic-the-gathering-print-collection?ref=10rt9p

Today's video shows that attacking for 14 damage on turn two is still a thing in Standard thanks to Hemosymbic Mite in Gruul Aggro.
